ResultSet2FileSender
SendersEndpointJDBC
QuerySender that writes each row in a ResultSet to a file.

Please note that the default value of trimSpaces is true

See also
Github - ResultSet2FileSender Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.jdbc.ResultSet2FileSender
Syntax
Copy
<ResultSet2FileSender query="" filenameSessionKey=""/>
Attributes
Required
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
filenameSessionKey	text	-
Key of session variable that contains the name of the file to use.
query	text	-
The SQL query text to be executed each time sendMessage() is called
Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
statusFieldType	text	-
Type of the optional status field which is set after the row is written to the file: time
